class.name: ColorRect
class.description: An object that is represented on the canvas as a rect with color. [Color] is used to set or get color info for the rect.

method.name: get_frame_color
method.description: Return the color in RGBA format. [codeblock] var cr = get_node("colorrect_node") var c = cr.get_frame_color() # Default color is white [/codeblock]

method.name: set_frame_color
method.description: Set new color to ColorRect. [codeblock] var cr = get_node("colorrect_node") cr.set_frame_color(Color(1, 0, 0, 1)) # Set color rect node to red [/codeblock]

members.member: The color to fill the [code]ColorRect[/code]. [codeblock] $ColorRect.color = Color(1, 0, 0, 1) # Set ColorRect node's color to red [/codeblock]
